channel.title: RackFlux or Whynotavps?
channel.description:
hello Moparscape i am buying a VPS and i want to know which one is better RackFlux or Whynotavps...
Other info: im using SSH client CentOS
here are the websites if you need it www.whynotavps.com www.rackflux.com

item.title: RackFlux or Whynotavps?
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

I recommend racksteady.co.uk, their managed plans are a bit on the expensive side but they offer amazing support, their unmanaged plans are a lot cheaper and while they may seem expensive you get what you pay for

I haven’t had any downtime with them since they opened for business and were ironing out some of the hitches

Read full topic

item.title: RackFlux or Whynotavps?
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I don’t know anything about hosting, nor do I have any experience with it (Except for ULMB, who I currently pay to host my website), but I would go with Rackflux. They have many plans and the company seems great to start with - $2 regular shared hosting and then you can upgrade to an eventual dedicated server. Sounds like the way to go in my opinion.

Read full topic
